alert.note: Alert for Gadsden (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 11:28AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wakulla, south central Gadsden, central Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1127 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southeast of Blountstown, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Telogia, Lake Talquin, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Hosford, Lowry, Wetumpka, Bloxham, Sawdust and Clio. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
